title: What is the need and importance of economic activity? - Quora

response.answer_text: In simple terms, Economic activity involves production , distribution, consumption and exchange. 1. To satisfy the human wants nd needs 2. To utilise the resources optimally In our day to day life economic activity takes place in every persons life in one or another way. Some involves in production and some in consumption and few gets the produced goods and trade. Land, labour, capital( investment),organisation and entrepreneurship the agents of production Economic activity increases income and welfare of the nation Employment opportunities increases when economic activity increases When innovation nd technology improves , human choices increases there by increasing the demand and also it tries to reduce scarcity

economic activity is every where..even we breathe it is economic activy..because whatever we took food ,it will be consumed as we breathe because calories burn..like wise every activity is economic.without economic activity ,society can not be imagined…no electricity, no transportation, no food etc.. that is it…so need and importance of econoic acitivity for economy is as much like breathe for body.
